attributes.action: Remove loophole in the 2003 sexual offences act that allows bestial necrophillia
attributes.background: It has come to light that whilst bestiality and necrophillia are criminalised by sections 69 and 70 of the Sexual Offences Act 2003 bestial necrophillia is expressly not covered. I ask parliament to redress this loophole that can give rise to grossly unacceptable behaviour.
